## Functions

### getNewSource() {#af58cbab9cb762f2d2a4baae6177e30e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static RegSubRegPair getNewSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> Def, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/peepholeoptimizer/#ac9b69446f99357cc880c06d10601bffa">PeepholeOptimizer::RewriteMapTy</a> &amp; RewriteMap, bool HandleMultipleSources=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a <code>Def.Reg</code> and Def.SubReg pair, use <code>RewriteMap</code> to find the new source to use for rewrite.

If <code>HandleMultipleSources</code> is true and multiple sources for a given <code>Def</code> are found along the way, we found a PHI instructions that needs to be rewritten. TODO: HandleMultipleSources should be removed once we test PHI handling with coalescable copies.

Definition at line <a href="#l01145">1145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertPHI() {#a8e7acd0466662074bd2486d1964cd173}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineInstr &amp; insertPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &gt; &amp; SrcRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; OrigPHI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Insert a PHI instruction with incoming edges <code>SrcRegs</code> that are guaranteed to have the same register class.

This is necessary whenever we successfully traverse a PHI instruction and find suitable sources coming from its edges. By inserting a new PHI, we provide a rewritten PHI def suitable to be used in a new COPY instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l01109">1109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- PeepholeOptimizer.cpp - Peephole Optimizations ---------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform peephole optimizations on the machine code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Optimize Extensions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Optimization of sign / zero extension instructions. It may be extended to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     handle other instructions with similar properties.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     On some targets, some instructions, e.g. X86 sign / zero extension, may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     leave the source value in the lower part of the result. This optimization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     will replace some uses of the pre-extension value with uses of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     sub-register of the results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Optimize Comparisons</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Optimization of comparison instructions. For instance, in this code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       sub r1, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       cmp r1, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       bz  L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     If the &quot;sub&quot; instruction all ready sets (or could be modified to set) the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     same flag that the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction sets and that &quot;bz&quot; uses, then we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     eliminate the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Another instance, in this code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       sub r1, r3 | sub r1, imm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       cmp r3, r1 or cmp r1, r3 | cmp r1, imm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       bge L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     If the branch instruction can use flag from &quot;sub&quot;, then we can replace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &quot;sub&quot; with &quot;subs&quot; and eliminate the &quot;cmp&quot; instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Optimize Loads:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Loads that can be folded into a later instruction. A load is foldable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     if it loads to virtual registers and the virtual register defined has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     a single use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Optimize Copies and Bitcast (more generally, target specific copies):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Rewrite copies and bitcasts to avoid cross register bank copies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     when possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     E.g., Consider the following example, where capital and lower</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     letters denote different register file:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b = copy A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     C = copy b &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b = copy A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     C = copy A &lt;-- same-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     E.g., for bitcast:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b = bitcast A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     C = bitcast b &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b = bitcast A &lt;-- cross-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     C = copy A    &lt;-- same-bank copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-h">llvm/CodeGen/PeepholeOptimizer.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Interface to query instructions amenable to copy rewriting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; The index of the source being rewritten.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ad2bfa5ae4bc00ede215508c597f2e543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ad2bfa5ae4bc00ede215508c597f2e543">~Rewriter</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the next rewritable source (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the related value that it affects (DstReg, DstSubReg).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A source is considered rewritable if its register class and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// register class of the related DstReg may not be register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// coalescer friendly. In other words, given a copy-like instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not all the arguments may be returned at rewritable source, since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// some arguments are none to be register coalescer friendly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Each call of this method moves the current source to the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// rewritable source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For instance, let CopyLike be the instruction to rewrite.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CopyLike has one definition and one source:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dst.dstSubIdx = CopyLike src.srcSubIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The first call will give the first rewritable source, i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the only source this instruction has:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (src, srcSubIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This source defines the whole definition, i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, dstSubIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The second and subsequent calls will return false, as there is only one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// rewritable source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return True if a rewritable source has been found, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The output arguments are valid if and only if true is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Rewrite the current source with \\p NewReg and \\p NewSubReg if possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return True if the rewriting was possible, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac8009fc29123ba030ea30157cf18c62d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac8009fc29123ba030ea30157cf18c62d">RewriteCurrentSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewSubReg) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/copyrewriter/#aad38fdd50746fc9bc7e8f08e886415d5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/copyrewriter/#aad38fdd50746fc9bc7e8f08e886415d5">CopyRewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Specialized rewriter for INSERT&#95;SUBREG instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747">InsertSubregRewriter</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#a8d792ce793510d7ac2ad168873579747">InsertSubregRewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isInsertSubreg() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see See Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Here CopyLike has the following form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dst = INSERT&#95;SUBREG Src1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Src1 has the same register class has dst, hence, there is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nothing to rewrite.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Src2.src2SubIdx, may not be register coalescer friendly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Therefore, the first call to this method returns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Subsequence calls will return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#aae0a3466d999e3c2435e10e766335499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/insertsubregrewriter/#aae0a3466d999e3c2435e10e766335499">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we already get the only source we can rewrite, return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> == 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are looking at v2 = INSERT&#95;SUBREG v0, v1, sub0.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Here CopyLike has the following form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dst.dstSubIdx = EXTRACT&#95;SUBREG Src, subIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// There is only one rewritable source: Src.subIdx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// which defines dst.dstSubIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/extractsubregrewriter/#a79218c7fe32c8fb42e07cebb08c578e4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/extractsubregrewriter/#a79218c7fe32c8fb42e07cebb08c578e4">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we already get the only source we can rewrite, return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are looking at v1 = EXTRACT&#95;SUBREG v0, sub0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MOExtractedReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Src =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a>(MOExtractedReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(2).getImm());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we find a source that does not require to extract something,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rewrite the operation with a copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewSubReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the current index to an invalid position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not want another call to this method to be able</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to do any change.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the operation as a COPY.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get rid of the sub-register index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.removeOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Morph the operation into a COPY.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.setDesc(TII.get(TargetOpcode::COPY));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> + 1).setImm(NewSubReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#a87532e5082e8fff97e3e6b62104c244a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#a87532e5082e8fff97e3e6b62104c244a">RegSequenceRewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a33607cdfed7a2110695c526b7520d224">Rewriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isRegSequence() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Here CopyLike has the following form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dst = REG&#95;SEQUENCE Src1.src1SubIdx, subIdx1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Each call will return a different source, walking all the available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The first call returns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src1, src1SubIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The second call returns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// And so on, until all the sources have been traversed, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it returns false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#af67bc5de34066daeefa8468bc983e737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#af67bc5de34066daeefa8468bc983e737">getNextRewritableSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Dst)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are looking at v0 = REG&#95;SEQUENCE v1, sub1, v2, sub2, etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is the first call, move to the first argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, move to the next argument and check that it is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> += 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getNumOperands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MOInsertedReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Src.Reg = MOInsertedReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have to compose sub-register indices, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Src.SubReg = MOInsertedReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a028a8c5113d40d8c3f4427053bf36738">getSubReg</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to track something that is compatible with the related</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partial definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Dst.SubReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> + 1).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MODef = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Dst.Reg = MODef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MODef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a028a8c5113d40d8c3f4427053bf36738">getSubReg</a>() == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;cannot have subregister def in SSA&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#ad1e6780b2cde967f55f56868b46c01a1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/regsequencerewriter/#ad1e6780b2cde967f55f56868b46c01a1">RewriteCurrentSource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewSubReg)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot rewrite out of bound operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Moreover, rewritable sources are at odd positions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &amp; 1) != 1 || <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getNumOperands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#ac58143cbdf601d044e69002face8a19b">CurrentSrcIdx</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class to hold instructions that are inside recurrence cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The recurrence cycle is formulated around 1) a def operand and its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tied use operand, or 2) a def operand and a use operand that is commutable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with another use operand which is tied to the def operand. In the latter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// case, index of the tied use operand and the commutable use operand are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// maintained with CommutePair.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/recurrenceinstr/#a8a26459dfc2a52b07f2060e8a9612977">RecurrenceInstr</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class to track the possible sources of a value defined by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a (chain of) copy related instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a definition (instruction and definition index), this class</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// follows the use-def chain to find successive suitable sources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The given source can be used to rewrite the definition into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// def = COPY src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For instance, let us consider the following snippet:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// v0 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// v2 = INSERT&#95;SUBREG v1, v0, sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// def = COPY v2.sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Using a ValueTracker for def = COPY v2.sub0 will give the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// suitable sources:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// v2.sub0 and v0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Then, def can be rewritten into def = COPY v0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb">ValueTracker</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The current point into the use-def chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;Def = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The index of the definition in Def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a ValueTracker instance for the value defined by \\p Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p DefSubReg represents the sub register index the value tracker will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// track. It does not need to match the sub register index used in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// definition of \\p Reg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p Reg is a physical register, a value tracker constructed with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this constructor will not find any alternative source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Indeed, when \\p Reg is a physical register that constructor does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// know which definition of \\p Reg it should track.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Use the next constructor to track a physical register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb">ValueTracker</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefSubReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;MRI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : DefSubReg(DefSubReg), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>), MRI(MRI), TII(TII) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>.isPhysical()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Def = MRI.getVRegDef(Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DefIdx = MRI.def&#95;begin(Reg).getOperandNo();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return A ValueTrackerResult containing a set of registers</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %reg1026 = SUBREG&#95;TO&#95;REG 0, %reg1027, 4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExtendLife &amp;&amp; !ExtendedUses.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extend the liveness of the extension result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.append(ExtendedUses.begin(), ExtendedUses.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now replace all uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt; PHIBBs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for PHI uses of the extended result, we don&#39;t want to extend the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// liveness of a PHI input. It breaks all kinds of assumptions down</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stream. A PHI use is expected to be the kill of its source values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">    for (MachineInstr &amp;UI : MRI-&gt;use&#95;nodbg&#95;instructions(DstReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (UI.isPHI())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PHIBBs.insert(UI.getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI-&gt;getRegClass(SrcReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    for (MachineOperand &#42;UseMO : Uses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineInstr &#42;UseMI = UseMO-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineBasicBlock &#42;UseMBB = UseMI-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (PHIBBs.count(UseMBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">        continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// About to add uses of DstReg, clear DstReg&#39;s kill flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (!Changed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MRI-&gt;clearKillFlags(DstReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MRI-&gt;constrainRegClass(DstReg, DstRC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SubReg defs are illegal in machine SSA phase,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we should not generate SubReg defs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, for the instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %1:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0 = EXTSW %0:g8rc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %0.sub&#95;32:g8rc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We should generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %1:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0 = EXTSW %0:g8rc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %6:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %1.sub&#95;32:g8rc&#95;and&#95;g8rc&#95;nox0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %3:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0 = COPY %6:gprc&#95;and&#95;gprc&#95;nor0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (UseSrcSubIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RC = MRI-&gt;getRegClass(UseMI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Register NewVR = MRI-&gt;createVirtualRegister(RC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BuildMI(&#42;UseMBB, UseMI, UseMI-&gt;getDebugLoc(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">              TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::COPY), NewVR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .addReg(DstReg, 0, SubIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (UseSrcSubIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UseMO-&gt;setSubReg(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UseMO-&gt;setReg(NewVR);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumReuse;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Changed = true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
