<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Try to find the next source that share the same register file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for the value defined by \\p Reg and \\p SubReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When true is returned, the \\p RewriteMap can be used by the client to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// retrieve all Def -&gt; Use along the way up to the next source. Any found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Use that is not itself a key for another entry, is the next source to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use. During the search for the next source, multiple sources can be found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// given multiple incoming sources of a PHI instruction. In this case, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// look in each PHI source for the next source; all found next sources must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// share the same register file as \\p Reg and \\p SubReg. The client should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then be capable to rewrite all intermediate PHIs to get the next source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return False if no alternative sources are available. True otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PeepholeOptimizer::findNextSource(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> RegSubReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       RewriteMapTy &amp;RewriteMap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not try to find a new source for a physical register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So far we do not have any motivating example for doing that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thus, instead of maintaining untested code, we will revisit that if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that changes at some point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = RegSubReg.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>.isPhysical())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;DefRC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RegSubRegPair, 4&gt;</a> SrcToLook;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> CurSrcPair = RegSubReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SrcToLook.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(CurSrcPair);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PHICount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurSrcPair = SrcToLook.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As explained above, do not handle physical registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#affdbf5b92ed7e01352e2f39466efbe21">isPhysical</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker/#a2b6a1a42542bec9018068ce22e56f1eb">ValueTracker</a> ValTracker(CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>, CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#a66f92cf2247d7b3c3a351ff48dd42d7d">SubReg</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Follow the chain of copies until we find a more suitable source, a phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or have to abort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetrackerresult/#ae5abded57b308757f3a593284dcdab5c">ValueTrackerResult</a> Res = ValTracker.getNextSource();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort at the end of a chain (without finding a suitable source).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Res.isValid())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the Def -&gt; Use entry for the recently found source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetrackerresult/#ae5abded57b308757f3a593284dcdab5c">ValueTrackerResult</a> CurSrcRes = RewriteMap.lookup(CurSrcPair);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurSrcRes.isValid()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CurSrcRes == Res &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ValueTrackerResult found must match&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An existent entry with multiple sources is a PHI cycle we must avoid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise it&#39;s an entry with a valid next source we already found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurSrcRes.getNumSources() &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;findNextSource: found PHI cycle, aborting...\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RewriteMap.insert(std::make&#95;pair(CurSrcPair, Res));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ValueTrackerResult usually have one source unless it&#39;s the result from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a PHI instruction. Add the found PHI edges to be looked up further.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcs = Res.getNumSources();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumSrcs &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PHICount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHICount &gt;= <a href="#a1be9488c571a34b74f37158bf59b16c4">RewritePHILimit</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;findNextSource: PHI limit reached\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumSrcs; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SrcToLook.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Res.getSrc(i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurSrcPair = Res.getSrc(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not extend the live-ranges of physical registers as they add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constraints to the register allocator. Moreover, if we want to extend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the live-range of a physical register, unlike SSA virtual register,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we will have to check that they aren&#39;t redefine before the related use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#affdbf5b92ed7e01352e2f39466efbe21">isPhysical</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep following the chain if the value isn&#39;t any better yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;SrcRC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;shouldRewriteCopySrc(DefRC, RegSubReg.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#a66f92cf2247d7b3c3a351ff48dd42d7d">SubReg</a>, SrcRC,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#a66f92cf2247d7b3c3a351ff48dd42d7d">SubReg</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We currently cannot deal with subreg operands on PHI instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (see insertPHI()).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHICount &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#a66f92cf2247d7b3c3a351ff48dd42d7d">SubReg</a> != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found a suitable source, and are done with this chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcToLook.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we did not find a more suitable source, there is nothing to optimize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurSrcPair.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/regsubregpair/#aad7e848e562b1368d6ee4794d84957c6">Reg</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Insert a PHI instruction with incoming edges \\p SrcRegs that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// guaranteed to have the same register class. This is necessary whenever we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// successfully traverse a PHI instruction and find suitable sources coming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from its edges. By inserting a new PHI, we provide a rewritten PHI def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// suitable to be used in a new COPY instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109" lineLink="#a8e7acd0466662074bd2486d1964cd173"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="#a8e7acd0466662074bd2486d1964cd173">insertPHI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;RegSubRegPair&gt;</a> &amp;SrcRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;OrigPHI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!SrcRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No sources to create a PHI instruction?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;NewRC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getRegClass(SrcRegs&#91;0&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewRC is only correct if no subregisters are involved. findNextSource()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should have rejected those cases already.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Optimize generic copy instructions to avoid cross register bank copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The optimization looks through a chain of copies and tries to find a source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that has a compatible register class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Two register classes are considered to be compatible if they share the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register bank.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// New copies issued by this optimization are register allocator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// friendly. This optimization does not remove any copy as it may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// overconstrain the register allocator, but replaces some operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\pre isCoalescableCopy(&#42;MI) is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return True, when \\p MI has been rewritten. False otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PeepholeOptimizer::optimizeCoalescableCopy(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDesc().getNumDefs() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Optimize copy-like instructions to create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register coalescer friendly instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The optimization tries to kill-off the \\p MI by looking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// through a chain of copies to find a source that has a compatible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If such a source is found, it replace \\p MI by a generic COPY</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\pre isUncoalescableCopy(&#42;MI) is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return True, when \\p MI has been optimized. In that case, \\p MI has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// been removed from its parent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// All COPY instructions created, are inserted in \\p LocalMIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PeepholeOptimizer::optimizeUncoalescableCopy(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LocalMIs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(isUncoalescableCopy(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid argument&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/uncoalescablerewriter/#ac508181ecb468aa9a608f61223e92413">UncoalescableRewriter</a> CpyRewriter(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite each rewritable source by generating new COPYs. This works</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// differently from optimizeCoalescableCopy since it first makes sure that all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definitions can be rewritten.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RewriteMapTy RewriteMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RegSubRegPair, 4&gt;</a> RewritePairs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CpyRewriter.getNextRewritableSource(Src, Def)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a physical register is here, this is probably for a good reason.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not rewrite that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>.Reg.isPhysical())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we do not know how to rewrite this definition, there is no point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in trying to kill this instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!findNextSource(Def, RewriteMap))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RewritePairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Def);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The change is possible for all defs, do it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp;Def : RewritePairs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the &quot;copy&quot; in a way the register coalescer understands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;NewCopy = rewriteSource(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, Def, RewriteMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocalMIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(&amp;NewCopy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MI is now dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Deleting uncoalescable copy: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumUncoalescableCopies;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Phi instructions will eventually be lowered to copy instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If phi is in a loop header, a recurrence may formulated around the source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and destination of the phi. For such case commuting operands of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions in the recurrence may enable coalescing of the copy instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// generated from the phi. For example, if there is a recurrence of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopHeader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %1 = phi(%0, %100)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopLatch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %0&lt;def, tied1&gt; = ADD %2&lt;def, tied0&gt;, %1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// , the fact that %0 and %2 are in the same tied operands set makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the coalescing of copy instruction generated from the phi in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopHeader(i.e. %1 = COPY %0) impossible, because %1 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %2 have overlapping live range. This introduces additional move</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction to the final assembly. However, if we commute %2 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %1 of ADD instruction, the redundant move instruction can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// avoided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PeepholeOptimizer::optimizeRecurrence(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;Register, 2&gt;</a> TargetRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 1; Idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>.getNumOperands(); Idx += 2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>.getOperand(Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="#a544e5e236fec930c7f0478c3f6e3b43e">isVirtualRegisterOperand</a>(MO) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid PHI instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TargetRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">ValueTrackerResult ValueTracker::getNextSourceFromRegSequence() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;isRegSequence() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;isRegSequenceLike()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid definition&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;getOperand(DefIdx).getSubReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are composing subregs, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The case we are checking is Def.&lt;subreg&gt; = REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should almost never happen as the SSA property is tracked at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the register level (as opposed to the subreg level).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// I.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def.sub0 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def.sub1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a valid SSA representation for Def.sub0 and Def.sub1, but not for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def. Thus, it must not be generated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, some code could theoretically generates a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def.sub0 (i.e, not defining the other subregs) and we would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can ascertain (or force) that this never happens, we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turn that into an assertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueTrackerResult();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RegSubRegPairAndIdx, 8&gt;</a> RegSeqInputRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getRegSequenceInputs(&#42;Def, DefIdx, RegSeqInputRegs))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueTrackerResult();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are looking at:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def = REG&#95;SEQUENCE v0, sub0, v1, sub1, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if one of the operand defines the subreg we are interested in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ad153312ce0e21a9c411b560bd535b1b7">RegSubRegPairAndIdx</a> &amp;RegSeqInput : RegSeqInputRegs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegSeqInput.SubIdx == DefSubReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueTrackerResult(RegSeqInput.Reg, RegSeqInput.SubReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the subreg we are tracking is super-defined by another subreg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we could follow this value. However, this would require to compose</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the subreg and we do not do that for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueTrackerResult();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
